metadata.title: CVE-2024-38585 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tools/nolibc/stdlib: fix memory error in realloc() Pass user_p_len tomemcpy() instead of heap->len to prevent realloc() from copying an extrasizeof(heap) bytes from beyond the allocated region.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
